🧮 Standard Problem 1

“Try to solve it using only elementary school knowledge!”

There is a well where water springs up at a rate of 5 liters per minute.

If a pump that draws up water at 20 liters per minute is used, the water runs out in 15 minutes.

Question: If a pump that draws 30 liters per minute is used instead, how many minutes will it take for the water to run out?

📝 Hint

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
